maqras.text: atyunnatudaina ni prabhuvu namanni stutincu
ayane (pratidanini) srstincadu mariyu tagina pramananlo rupondincadu
mariyu ayane dani prakrti laksanalanu nirnayincadu, mariyu margam cupadu
Mariyu ayane paccikanu molipimpa jesadu
marala danini nallani cettacedaranga cesadu
memu niceta (khur'an nu) cadivimpa jestamu, taruvata nivu (danini) maracipovu
allah korindi tappa! Niscayanga, bahiranganga unnadi mariyu gopyanga unnadi anni ayanaku baga telusu
mariyu memu ni marganni sulabham ceyadaniki niku saulabhyanni kalugajestamu
kavuna nivu hitopadesam cestu undu; variki hitopadesam labhadayakam kavaccu
(allah ku) bhayapade vadu hitopadesanni svikaristadu
mariyu daurbhagyudu daniki duramai potadu
alanti vade ghoramaina narakagnilo padi kalutadu
appudu, atadu andulo cavanu ledu, bratakanu ledu
susilatanu (pavitratanu) patince vadu tappaka saphalyam pondutadu
mariyu tana prabhuvu namanni smaristu, namaj cestu undevadu
ala kadu! Miru aihika jivitaniki pradhan'yata nistunnaru
kani paraloka jivitame melainadi mariyu cirakalamundedi
niscayanga, i visayam purvagranthalalo (vrayabadi) undi
ibrahim mariyu musalapai (avatarimpajeyabadina) granthalalo
hathattuga asannamayye a vipattu (punarut'thana dinapu) samacaram niku andinda
konni mukhalu a roju vali (krungi) poyi untayi
(prapancanloni vrtha) sramaku, (paralokanlo jarige) avamananiki
varu dahince agnilo padi kalutaru
variki salasala kage celama niru tragataniki ivvabadutundi
variki cedu mullagadda (dari'a) tappa maroka aharam undadu
adi variki balamu niyyadu mariyu akali tircadu
a rojuna, marikonni mukhalu kalakalaladutu untayi
tamu cesukunna satkaryalaku (phalitalaku) varu santosapadutu untaru
atyunnatamaina svargavananlo
andulo varu elanti vrtha matalu vinaru
andulo pravahince selayellu untayi
andulo ettaina asanalu untayi
Mariyu percabadina (madhu) patralu
mariyu varusaluga veyabadina, dindlu
mariyu paracabadina nanyamaina tivacilu
emiti? Varu ontela vaipu cudara? Avi ela srstincabaddayo
mariyu akasam vaipuku (cudara)? Adi ela paiki ettabadi undo
mariyu kondala vaipuku cudara?Avi ela gattiga natabadi unnayo
mariyu bhumi vaipuku (cudara)? Adi ela visalanga paracabadi undo
kavuna (o muham'mad!) Nivu hitopadesam cestu undu, vastavaniki nivu kevalam hitopadesam cese vadavu matrame
nivu varini (visvasincamani) balavantam cesevadavu kavu
ika, evadaite venudirugutado mariyu satyanni tiraskaristado
appudu ataniki allah ghorasiksa vidhistadu
niscayanga, ma vaipunake vari maralimpu undi
a tarvata niscayanga, vari lekka tisukunedi meme
prantah kalam saksiga
padi ratrula saksiga
sari besila saksiga
gadacipoye ratri saksiga
vitilo bud'dhigala vani koraku e pramanamu leda emiti
ni prabhuvu ad (jati) vari patla ela vyavaharincado niku teliyada
ettaina sthambhala (bhavanalu gala) iram prajala patla
varilanti jati bhumilo ennadu srstincabadaledu
mariyu loyalaloni kondarallalo (bhavanalanu) tolicina samud jati patla
mariyu mekulavadaina phir'aun patla
varanta aya desalalo talabirusutananto pravartincaru
mariyu vatilo daurjan'yanni rekettincaru
kabatti ni prabhuvu varipaiki aneka rakala badhakaramaina siksalanu pampadu
vastavaniki, ni prabhuvu matu vesi unnadu (anta kanipedtu untadu)
ayite manavudu elanti vadante: Atani prabhuvu atanni pariksincataniki, ataniki gaurava pratistala nicci anugrahinci nappudu: "Na prabhuvu nannu gauravincadu." Ani antadu
Kani, atanni pariksincataniki, atani upadhini taggincinappudu: "Na prabhuvu nannu avamanincadu." Ani antadu
ala kadu, vastavaniki miru anathulanu adarincaru
mariyu miru pedalaku annam pette visayanlo okarinokaru protsahincukoru
mariyu varasatvapu astini perasato anta mire tinestaru
mariyu miru dhanavyamohanlo darunanga cikkuku poyaru
ala kadu, bhumi, danci pindipindiga ceyabadinapudu
mariyu ni prabhuvu (svayanga) vastadu mariyu devadutalu varusalalo vastaru
a roju narakam (munduku) tisuku rabadutundi. A roju manavudu (tana karmalanni) jnaptiki teccukuntadu; kani a roju jnaptiki teccukovadam valla ataniki kalige prayojanamemiti
atadu: "Ayyo! Na paduganu! Na i jivitam koraku nenu (satkaryalu) cesi pampu koni unte enta bagundedi!" Ani vapotadu
ayite, a roju, ayana (allah) siksincinatlu, marevvadu siksincaledu
mariyu ayana (allah) bandhincinatlu, marevvadu bandhincaledu
(sanmargunito ila anabadutundi): "O trpti pondina atma
ni prabhuvu sannidhiki marali ra! (Niku labhince satphalitaniki) anandistu mariyu (ni prabhuvunaku) priyamainadanivai
nivu (punyatmulaina) na dasulalo ceripo
mariyu nivu na svarganlo pravesincu
